name: flogo-workfusion
title: WorkFusion Copy and Run
description: Copies and runs a WorkFusion business process

settings.name: url
settings.description: The URL of the service to invoke

settings.name: username
settings.description: The username used to connect to the WorkFusion API

settings.name: password
settings.description: The password used to connect to the WorkFusion API

input.name: uuid
input.description: The UUID of the business process to copy and run

output.name: uuid
output.description: The UUID of the new business process
